Faculties.facilitiesSubtitle: Supporting the teaching and learning process with modern infrastructure and industry-standard laboratories.
Faculties.title: Faculties & Study Programs
Faculties.subtitle: Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap has various faculties and study programs focused on producing competent and characterful graduates.
Faculties.notFoundDesc: Sorry, the faculty you are looking for is not available.
Faculties.aboutDesc: This faculty is committed to providing high-quality education with a curriculum that is continuously updated in accordance with the development of science and industry needs. With competent teaching staff and complete facilities, we prepare students to become professionals ready to contribute to society and the nation.
Faculties.locationDesc: UNAIC campus is strategically located in the center of Cilacap city, making it easy for students and the surrounding community to access.

health.name: Faculty of Health Sciences

dean.name: Siti Muthoharoh, S.Kep., Ners., M.Kep.
dean.title: Dean of the Faculty of Health Sciences
dean.message: The Faculty of Health Sciences (FIKES) UNAIC serves as a bridge for future professional health workers to achieve their dreams. We are committed to organizing higher health education that is not only academically excellent but also upholds Islamic values.

health.vision: To become an Excellent Health Science Faculty, with Islamic Character and Global Competitiveness by 2045.
missions: Organizing quality, professional health science education and teaching with Islamic character.
Carrying out innovative and tested research in the field of health that is relevant to community needs.
Carrying out appropriate community internal service in the field of health.
Establishing sustainable cooperation with various national and international institutions.

facilities.title: Nursing Laboratory
facilities.description: Medical simulation facilities with hospital-standard equipment.

facilities.title: Midwifery Laboratory
facilities.description: Complete practice room for delivery and maternal-child health.

facilities.title: Physiotherapy Laboratory
facilities.description: Equipped with the latest medical rehabilitation equipment.

facilities.title: Digital Library
facilities.description: Access to thousands of international health journals and medical references.

science.name: Faculty of Pharmacy, Science & Tech

dean.name: Eko Ari Cahyo, M.Farm., Apt.
dean.title: Dean of the Faculty of Pharmacy, Science & Technology
dean.message: FFST UNAIC is committed to producing scientists and technology practitioners who are not only technically proficient but also have moral integrity. We focus on research that provides solutions to future health and technology challenges.

science.vision: To become an excellent Faculty in the development of science and technology in the fields of Pharmacy and Information Technology with Islamic character and Global Competitiveness by 2045.
missions: Organizing pharmacy and technology education that is adaptive to Industry 4.0.
Developing innovative and applicable science and technology research.
Carrying out community service based on science and technology products.
Building strategic partnerships with national and international industries.

facilities.title: Pharmaceutics Lab
facilities.description: Modern compounding and pharmaceutical formulation facilities.

facilities.title: Computer & Informatics Lab
facilities.description: High-speed software development and data analysis center.

facilities.title: Analytical Chemistry Lab
facilities.description: Fully equipped with HPLC and Spectrophotometry instruments.

facilities.title: Teaching Pharmacy
facilities.description: Simulation pharmacy for developing clinical pharmacist skills.

business.name: Faculty of Economics & Business

dean.name: Arif Rahman, M.B.A.
dean.title: Dean of the Faculty of Economics & Business
dean.message: FEB UNAIC creates future technopreneurs. We believe that a successful business is one built on Islamic ethical values and the smart utilization of digital technology.

business.vision: To become an Excellent Faculty of Economics and Business with Islamic Character in the Field of Digital Business and Entrepreneurship by 2045.
missions: Organizing digital business and entrepreneurship education based on Islamic values.
Conducting innovative research in the creative and digital economy sectors.
Providing business assistance to MSMEs and the wider community.
Creating an entrepreneurial ecosystem within the campus environment.

facilities.title: Investment Gallery
facilities.description: Real-time capital market learning and stock analysis center.

facilities.title: Business Incubator
facilities.description: A place for developing student startups with mentor guidance.

facilities.title: Coworking Space
facilities.description: Creative collaboration space for student business ideation.

facilities.title: Digital Lab
facilities.description: Digital marketing and e-commerce business analysis facilities.

faqs.title: What is the procedure for Study Plan (KRS)?
faqs.content:
Students can perform KRS through the UNAIC academic portal by following these steps:

  1. Login to the academic portal
  2. Select the KRS menu
  3. Select the desired courses
  4. Confirm and save KRS

faqs.title: How to apply for academic leave?
faqs.content:
To apply for academic leave, students must:

  • Fill out the leave application form
  • Attach a recommendation letter from parents/guidance
  • Submit to BAAK for processing
  • Maximum leave is 1 semester per year

faqs.title: How to obtain an active student certificate?
faqs.content:
An active student certificate can be obtained by:

  • Login to the academic portal
  • Select the "Certificates" menu
  • Select "Active Student Certificate"
  • Download and print the certificate

surveyQuestions: The officer provides clear and easy-to-understand information regarding academic procedures.
The service provided by BAAK is fast and according to the specified time.
The officers are friendly, polite, and communicative in serving students.
Academic information is easily accessible through the portal or notice board.
Facilities and service rooms at BAAK are comfortable and well-organized.

Research.title: Research & Innovation
Research.subtitle: Developing science and technology through high-quality research.
Research.focusDesc: Research at UNAIC is directed towards answering future health and technology challenges. We focus on developing innovations that can be applied directly to improve the community's quality of life. Research spans health, pharmacy, midwifery, and information technology fields.
Research.ethicsDesc: Ethical review services to ensure research meets ethical standards and protects research subjects.
Research.hkiDesc: Assistance in registering Intellectual Property Rights (IPR) and Patents from the research of the academic community.
Research.pubDesc: Facilitating the publication of research results in accredited national journals and reputable international journals.

Footer.description: Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap (UNAIC) is a higher education institution committed to producing excellent, characterized, and globally competitive graduates.

Partners.networkDesc: We have established cooperation with over 100 strategic partners including hospitals, industries, governments, and leading universities both domestically and abroad.

AcademicPolicy.title: Academic Policy
AcademicPolicy.subtitle: Standards, rules, and academic guidelines of Al-Irsyad University of Cilacap.
AcademicPolicy.description: Al-Irsyad University of Cilacap (UNAIC) establishes academic policies that form the basis for organizing higher education. These policies include curriculum, learning processes, evaluation, research, and academic governance. Policy documents are designed so that the academic community can understand the rules and carry out the Tri Dharma of Higher Education in accordance with national standards.
AcademicPolicy.helpDesc: Contact the academic department to get the latest policy details.
AcademicPolicy.noData: No academic policy documents are currently available.

CommunityService.title: Community Service
CommunityService.subtitle: Downstreaming research results for the benefit of the wider community.
CommunityService.impactDesc: UNAIC is committed to not just developing knowledge in an ivory tower, but also hands-on solving problems in society. Through the Community Service (PKM) program, we apply technology and science to empower communities, improve health, and support the local economy.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.desc: Answers to questions frequently asked by prospective new students.

q1.title: When is registration open?
q1.content: New Student Admission at UNAIC usually opens in 3 waves. Wave 1 starts in January, Wave 2 in April, and Wave 3 in July. Please check the PMB website for exact dates.

q2.title: Are there scholarships at UNAIC?
q2.content: Yes, UNAIC provides various types of scholarships, including KIP Kuliah Scholarship, Foundation Scholarship, Academic & Non-Academic Achievement Scholarship, and Hafidz Qur'an Scholarship.

q3.title: How much is the registration fee?
q3.content: The registration fee for regular classes is Rp 250.000,-. For special paths or certain study programs there might be differences. Check fee details in the Tuition Fee menu.

q4.title: Can I register across majors?
q4.content: Yes. Science High School graduates can enter all study programs. Social/Language/Vocational High School graduates can enter certain study programs according to their respective regulations.
